sect1.title: Fatigue in Combat
sect1.para: In combat, be it melee or missile combat, the Fatigue heap must be increased every 5 rounds (30 seconds), no matter what actions are performed (fighting, moving, dodging, tending a wounded comrade, ...). As usual, Fatigue is increased by 1 plus the Encumbrance Penalty.
If a character does not perform any action (he just stands there), then his Fatigue does not increase.
